--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> His mind set on disrupting Animus', Azureblade did not start to
> notice
> the sphere until it was too late. They stuck on his armor and...

Several spheres struck Azureblade's armor and seemed to attach
themselves by some static electromagnetic charge. Through this
connection powerful waves of energy stream in an attempt to leech power
from their victim. The Sphere's anti-gravity fields switch and instead
of ignoring the effects of gravity as they do to fly, they actually
INCREASE their weight in an attempt to drag Azureblade to the ground,
even as they continued to attempt to drain off his power to resist!

Animus, for his part, heavily damaged by his last strike from
Azureblade continued to try to crawl back away from Azureblade and the
spheres. A look of gloating joy, mixed with pain and no little fear
fluttered across his face as he struggled. 

Preston
(Animus & the Spheres)
